title: 1.12.2agricraft 杂草生成怎么关闭 或者几率调小？？
author: 竹月
txt_content: 今天杂交被杂草弄的痛不欲生 十分之九出来的全是草。烦

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
查看配置文件，1.12.2貌似没法彻底禁止杂草生成，\config\agricraft\config.cfg
    # The average number of growth ticks for the weed to grow. [range: 10 ~ 50, default: 50]
    I:"Weed Growth Rate"=50
默认杂草生成最低10

replies.author: 竹月
replies.txt_content:
